overview: A documentary covering the greatest Minecraft server to ever exist. 11 friends, dubbing themselves the 'Minecraft Homies', decide to create a new Minecraft server in their college years during the COVID-19 era. What ensues is the craziest cultivation of powerful friendships, harrowing betrayals, and a whole lot of laughs. Witness the greatest journey among friends as they prove that no matter how separated you are, you can still be closer than ever.
tagline: It's about time that we mine some diamonds.
title: Fortbuscus: The Movie
